wikipedia_page.main: Michael Hazelwood  (born 14 April 1958) is a retired British water skier and a was the world overall champion in 1977.

response: Michael Edward HazlewoodMike Hazlewood Discography at Discogs. discogs. Retrieved 4 January 2013. (24 December 1941Michael Edward Hazlewood entry at Geni.com (pictured). Retrieved 25 August 2014. – 6 May 2001)Mike Hazelwood – Credits. AllMusic (6 May 2001). Retrieved 4 January 2013. was a British singer, composer and songwriter. He variously worked with Albert Hammond, T-Bone Burnett, Van Dyke Parks and Harry Nilsson.
